channel.title: kotlin on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in kotlin on Jane - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: kotlin协程2
item.description: 基础 implementation("org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core:1.4.2") import kotlinx.coroutines.* GlobalScope.launch delay runBlocking job.join() coroutineScope suspend repeat 协程像守护线程 协程很轻量 结构化并发 取消与超时 job.cancel(), job.join(), job.cancelAndJoin() 取消是协作的 isActive 在 finally 中释放资源 finally 块中调用挂起函数, withContext(NonCancellable){xxx} 绝大多数取消一个

item.title: kotlin协程
item.description: 基础 implementation("org.jetbrains.kotlinx:kotlinx-coroutines-core:1.4.2") import kotlinx.coroutines.* GlobalScope.launch delay runBlocking job.join() coroutineScope suspend repeat 协程像守护线程 协程很轻量 结构化并发 取消与超时 job.cancel(), job.join(), job.cancelAndJoin() 取消是协作的 isActive 在 finally 中释放资源 finally 块中调用挂起函数, withContext(NonCancellable){xxx} 绝大多数取消一个
